long_description: The Aerobie Dogobie Flying Disc makes long, stable flights and is tough enough to endure fetch after fetch. Flexible, tear-resistant material is durable and gentle on your dog's mouth and easy to pick up. Aerobie Dogobie Flying Disc floats-perfect for playing in or near the water. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Aerobie Dogobie Flying Disc makes long, stable flights and is tough enough to endure fetch after fetch.
